decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (183-PROP-01A, dated 04-08-15, received 21/08/2015; Design and Access Statement YM/Alfathali/0715/aa, dated 2015, received 21/08/2015; Noise Impact Assessment 10578-NIA-01RevB, dated 20 November 2015, received  20/11/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The area marked on the approved plans as "shisha lounge smoking area" shall not be occupied by customers outside the hours of 10:00 to 23:00 Monday to Sunday including Public Holidays.
description: Change of use from restaurant (A3) to a mixed use as restaurant (A3) and shisha lounge (Sui Generis) at ground floor level and associated alterations
